Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to providing paid leave for city employees who serve as bone marrow or living organ donors and establishing a city bone marrow and living organ donor honor roll
Items.MatterName: Providing paid leave for city employees who serve as bone marrow or living organ donors and establishing a city bone marrow and living organ donor honor roll.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the New York city charter, in relation to clarifying the health code where approvals from multiple agencies are required
Items.MatterName: Clarifying the health code where approvals from multiple agencies are required.
